resources.string: See overview of all available memories and also for apps and processes
Just optional, but can makes your files more secure
Navigate from where ever you are to where ever you want. Comes very handy
Folder sizes, Preview for media files, Language change and any theme
Manage all your apps that are installed and also backup them up
Manage all your apps that are running
Hide any folder from showing up in the gallery
Set wallpaper from all the wallpapers, picture etc.

Jai Hind \m/ Peace \m/
